Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Workflow_related_id_behavior_source_id_source_type] ON [innovator].[WORKFLOW] ( [RELATED_ID] ASC, [BEHAVIOR] ASC ) INCLUDE ( [SOURCE_ID], [SOURCE_TYPE] ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON)
Item.name: IX_Workflow_related_id_behavior_source_id_source_type
